price: "Sai ku haɗa dabãrarku sa'an nan kuma ku tafi a sahu guda, kuma haƙĩƙa, wanda ya rinjãya, a yau, ya rabbanta."
arabic: فَأَجۡمِعُواْ كَيۡدَكُمۡ ثُمَّ ٱئۡتُواْ صَفّٗاۚ وَقَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ مَنِ ٱسۡتَعۡلَىٰ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-ajmiʿū kaydakum thumma i'tū ṣaffan waqad aflaḥa al-yawma mani is'taʿlā
